00028 #include "brisaeventproxy.h"

00030 using namespace BrisaUpnp;
00031 
00032 BrisaEventProxy::BrisaEventProxy(const QStringList &callbackUrls,
00033                                  BrisaWebserver *webserver,
00034                                  int &deliveryPath,
00035                                  QString host, 
00036                                  int port,
00037                                  QHttp *http,
00038                                  QString eventSub,
00039                                  QObject *parent) :
00040     BrisaAbstractEventSubscription(QString(), callbackUrls, -1, parent),
00041     requestId(-1),
00042     deliveryPath(deliveryPath),
00043     host(host),
00044     port(port),
00045     http(http),
00046     eventSub(eventSub),
00047     webServer(webserver)
00048 {
00049     eventService = new BrisaWebService(webServer, this);
00050     webserver->addService(QString().setNum(deliveryPath), eventService);
00051 
00052     QObject::connect(eventService,
00053                      SIGNAL(genericRequestReceived(BrisaWebService*, QMultiHash<QString, QString>, QString)),
00054                      this,
00055                      SLOT(eventReceived(BrisaWebService*, QMultiHash<QString, QString>, QString)));
00056 }
00057 
00058 BrisaEventProxy::~BrisaEventProxy() {
00059     // TODO remove service
00060     delete eventService;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void BrisaEventProxy::renew(const int &newTimeout) {
00064     QHttpRequestHeader *renewReq = getRenewRequest(newTimeout);
00065     http->setHost(host, port);
00066     requestId = http->request(*renewReq);
00067     qDebug() << requestId << " renew: " << renewReq->toString();
00068     delete renewReq;
00069 }
00070 
00071 int BrisaEventProxy::getId() {
00072     return this->requestId;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void BrisaEventProxy::subscribe(const int timeout) {
00076     QHttpRequestHeader *subscribeReq = getSubscriptionRequest(timeout);
00077     http->setHost(host, port);
00078     requestId = http->request(*subscribeReq);
00079     qDebug() << requestId << " subscription: " << subscribeReq->toString();
00080     delete subscribeReq;
00081 }
00082 
00083 void BrisaEventProxy::unsubscribe(void) {
00084     QHttpRequestHeader *unsubscribeReq = getUnsubscriptionRequest();
00085     http->setHost(host, port);
00086     int unsubId = http->request(*unsubscribeReq);
00087     qDebug() << unsubId << " unsubscription: " << unsubscribeReq->toString();
00088     delete unsubscribeReq;
00089 }
00090 
00091 QHttpRequestHeader *BrisaEventProxy::getSubscriptionRequest(const int timeout) {
00092     QHttpRequestHeader *request = new QHttpRequestHeader("SUBSCRIBE", eventSub);
00093 
00094     // Remote host
00095     request->setValue("HOST", host + ":" + QString().setNum(port));
00096 
00097     // Our URL for receiving notifications
00098     const QUrl url = this->getUrl();
00099 
00100     qDebug() << "Url: " << url.host() << " port: " << url.port();
00101     request->setValue("CALLBACK", "<http://"
00102                                     + url.host()
00103                                     + ":"
00104                                     + QString().setNum(url.port())
00105                                     + "/"
00106                                     + QString().setNum(deliveryPath)
00107                                     + ">");
00108 
00109     request->setValue("NT", "upnp:event");
00110     request->setValue("TIMEOUT", (timeout > 0)
00111                                     ? "Second-" + QString().setNum(timeout)
00112                                     : "INFINITE"); // INFINITE is obsolete in UPnP 1.1
00113     return request;
00114 }
00115 
00116 QHttpRequestHeader *BrisaEventProxy::getRenewRequest(const int timeout) const {
00117     if (this->getSid().isEmpty()) {
00118         qWarning() << "Renew failed: SID field not filled.";
00119         return NULL;
00120     }
00121 
00122     QHttpRequestHeader *request = new QHttpRequestHeader("SUBSCRIBE", eventSub);
00123     request->setValue("HOST", host + ":" + port);
00124     request->setValue("SID", getSid());
00125     request->setValue("TIMEOUT", (timeout > 0)
00126                                     ? "Second-" + QString().setNum(timeout)
00127                                     : "INFINITE");
00128     return request;
00129 }
00130 
00131 QHttpRequestHeader *BrisaEventProxy::getUnsubscriptionRequest() const {
00132     QHttpRequestHeader *request = new QHttpRequestHeader("UNSUBSCRIBE", eventSub);
00133     request->setValue("HOST", this->host + ":" + this->port);
00134     request->setValue("SID", this->SID);
00135     return request;
00136 }

00138 void BrisaEventProxy::eventReceived(BrisaWebService *service, QMultiHash<
00139         QString, QString> headers, QString rawData) {
00140     QString sid = headers.value("SID");
00141 
00142     if (sid.isEmpty()) {
00143         // Try "sid"
00144         sid = headers.value("sid");
00145     }
00146 
00147     if (sid.isEmpty()) {
00148         // TODO report subscription error to user
00149         qDebug() << "SID header not present on event subscription response.";
00150 
00151         foreach(QString key, headers.keys())
00152             {
00153                 qDebug() << key << headers.value(key);
00154             }
00155 
00156         qDebug() << "Finished printing headers..." << " Raw data: " << rawData;
00157 
00158         return;
00159     }
00160 
00161     QDomDocument doc;
00162     QMap<QString, QString> eventingVariables;
00163 
00164     doc.setContent(rawData, false);
00165     QDomElement root = doc.documentElement();
00166     QDomNodeList list = root.elementsByTagName("e:property");
00167 
00168     for (int i = 0; i < list.count(); i++) {
00169         QDomNodeList internal = list.at(i).childNodes();
00170 
00171         for (int j = 0; j < internal.count(); j++) {
00172             QDomElement stateVariable = internal.at(j).toElement();
00173             eventingVariables[stateVariable.tagName()] = stateVariable.text();
00174         }
00175     }
00176 
00177     emit eventNotification(this, eventingVariables);
00178 
00179     QHttpResponseHeader responseHeader(200, "OK");
00180     responseHeader.setValue("Connection", "close");
00181     responseHeader.setValue("Content-length", "0");
00182     service->respond(responseHeader);
00183 }
00184 
00185 void BrisaEventProxy::setSid(QString &sid) {
00186     this->SID = sid;
00187 }
